name: MegaRace 2
description: GOG version. Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).

files.file1:
N/A:Select the MegaRace 1+2 installer provided by GOG. You can download it here: 
https://secure.gog.com/downlink/megarace_1_2/en1installer0

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Megarace 1 + 2/DOSBOX/DOSBox.exe
files:
- file1: "N/A:Select the MegaRace 1+2 installer provided by GOG. You can download\
    \ it here: \nhttps://secure.gog.com/downlink/megarace_1_2/en1installer0"
game:
  args: -conf "../Megarace 2/dosboxmegarace2.conf" -conf "../Megarace 2/dosboxmegarace2_single.conf"
    -noconsole -c exit
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
